医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
疟疾晶体结构为更有效的药物提供线索莱斯利·莱瑟罗维茨 (Leslie Leiserowitz) 教授第一次对疟疾产生兴趣是在南非，当时他还是个小男孩。他的父亲为家族企业寻找木材，他的父亲不仅带回了大象和大猩猩的故事，还带回了皮疹和耳鸣，这是他服用奎宁来预防疟疾的副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Malaria-crystal-struct-offers-clues-for-more- effective-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Malaria-crystal-struct-offers-clues-for-more- effective-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d89368e1-8aba-46a8-870c-214c7b69e51b Tue, 19 Nov 2024 09:17:13 -0500 Malaria crystal structure offers clues for more effective medications
肽水凝胶提高抗生素对抗耐药细菌的有效性瑞典查尔姆斯理工大学的研究表明，当治疗与配备抗菌肽的材料相结合时，耐药细菌可以重新对抗生素敏感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Peptide-hydrogel-boosts-antibiotic-effectness-against-resistive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Peptide-hydrogel-boosts-antibiotic-effectness-against-resistive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=021ea54d-6a4f-4e2e-bdf4-2991188c0b83 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 09:10:42 -0500 Peptide hydrogel boosts antibiotic effectiveness against resistant bacteria
使用 Bio-Rad 的新型 ddPCR 试剂盒进行高精度 AAV 衣壳测量，从粗裂解物到纯度使用 Bio-Rad 的新型 ddPCR 试剂盒直接从粗裂解液中准确定量 AAV 衣壳，提供可靠、高效和精确的测量，以简化您的研究工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/From-crude-lysate-to-purity-with-high- precision-AAV-capsid-measurement-with-Bio-Rads-new-ddPCR-Kit。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/From-crude-lysate-to-purity-with-high- precision-AAV-capsid-measurement-with-Bio-Rads-new-ddPCR-Kit。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3721bfaf-2bb0-41d6-ae87-c2d5487cd1f9 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 09:05:00 -0500 From crude lysate to purity with high-precision AAV capsid measurement with Bio-Rad's new ddPCR Kit
研究揭示睡眠在增强脑损伤患者运动学习方面的作用凯斯勒基金会的科学家发表的新研究为睡眠在从创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 中恢复的个体运动学习中的作用提供了重要的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-reveals-the-power-of-sleep-in-enhancing-motor-learning-for-individuals-with-brain-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-reveals-the-power-of-sleep-in-enhancing-motor-learning-for-individuals-with-brain-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28726014-d52f-42bd-b04a-35013b9b4a8e Tue, 19 Nov 2024 09:04:47 -0500 Study reveals the power of sleep in enhancing motor learning for individuals with brain injury
新框架确保医疗保健人工智能的公平性和包容性最近发表在《医学互联网研究杂志》上的一项研究介绍了 EDAI 框架，这是一项综合指南，旨在将公平、多样性和包容性 (EDI) 原则嵌入整个人工智能 (AI) 生命周期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-framework-ensures-equity-and-inclusion-in-AI-for-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-framework-ensures-equity-and-inclusion-in-AI-for-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28d2cece-fbf2-4a05-90b6-bb3b5e9bbd48 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 08:16:01 -0500 New framework ensures equity and inclusion in AI for health care
运动员比非运动员表现出更好的工作记忆表现在认知科学中，最近人们越来越关注运动专业知识和工作记忆之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Athletes-show-better-working-memory-performance-than-non-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Athletes-show-better-working-memory-performance-than-non-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddb61c45-fb7d-466e-86fd-612b511f5900 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 08:08:00 -0500 Athletes show better working memory performance than non-athletes
全球分析揭示抗癌药物的成本和可用性存在显着差异最近的一项分析显示，全球不同地区抗癌药物的成本和可用性存在显着差异，高收入国家和低收入国家之间存在巨大差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Global-analysis-reveals-striking-disparities-in-the-cost-and-availability-of-cancer-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Global-analysis-reveals-striking-disparities-in-the-cost-and-availability-of-cancer-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2eb54b6d-eb59-4c41-abb7-3b5a3518e98a Tue, 19 Nov 2024 08:05:20 -0500 Global analysis reveals striking disparities in the cost and availability of cancer drugs
心脏病专家表示，体育和休闲活动对心脏病患者的好处大于风险虽然运动通常有益于人的整体健康，但体力活动可能会增加某些易感人群发生不良心血管疾病事件的风险。然而，心脏病专家表示，好处大于风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Benefits-of-sport-and-leisure-activities-outweigh-the-risks-for-people-with-heart-disease-cardiists-say.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Benefits-of-sport-and-leisure-activities-outweigh-the-risks-for-people-with-heart-disease-cardiists-say.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8aa02b81-026b-4cae-a874-558d701447e2 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 08:01:48 -0500 Benefits of sport and leisure activities outweigh the risks for people with heart disease, cardiologists say
新细胞模型揭示戊型肝炎病毒如何影响神经细胞使用新的细胞模型，研究人员首次可以研究戊型肝炎病毒如何影响神经细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-cell-model-reveals-how-hepatitis-E-viruses-affect-nerve-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-cell-model-reveals-how-hepatitis-E-viruses-affect-nerve-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d56bf40-030d-4fbe-8c0d-12185d310543 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 07:51:00 -0500 New cell model reveals how hepatitis E viruses affect nerve cells
研究：40%新诊断心力衰竭患者同时患有房颤盐湖城 Intermountain Health 的研究人员进行的一项新研究发现，40% 的新诊断心力衰竭患者还患有心房颤动，研究人员发现这是一种心脏疾病的组合，会导致患者的预后明显较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-4025-of-newly-diagnosed-heart-failure- Patients-also-have-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-4025-of-newly-diagnosed-heart-failure- Patients-also-have-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dcf2661-7366-4692-8514-feb7752a57a9 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 07:03:03 -0500 Study: 40% of newly diagnosed heart failure patients also have atrial fibrillation
